text:
CMS admins/editors expect to edit “navigation”.
*Why can’t we get to the navigation editor from the content menu?*

It would be really swell if we could include revision notes for files/modules in the Design Manager. A common issue agencies I have worked with have is the lack of communication between developers when it comes to updated files/modules.

I am a fan of this method and have worked with a few agencies that used this, but sometimes it's overkill and a simple optional field where you can type "Made accessibility adjustments" or " Removed x feature" would eliminate the need for all developers involved to work locally as well as be familiar with git.
